resources.string: Welcome to the app made for translation. Powered by Google ML Kit, you can translate at the click of a button.
Select what you would like to translate, whether it\'s text from an image, text itself, or your own voice!
Select what language you would like to translate from and to.
Hit the translate button and watch the magic happen!
If you forget how to use the app, you can come back to this at any time by clicking the button on the home page.
